title: Ball tracker: implement explicit unknown emission path for unevaluable frames
scope: Extend BallTracker to emit pos_state=unknown for defined unevaluable conditions, with explicit reasons.
Preserve strict trust-first behavior: never emit present without direct evidence.
acceptance: BallTracker emits pos_state=unknown (not missing) for at least one well-defined unevaluable condition, with explicit diagnostic reason.
BallTracker continues to emit explicit missing for evaluated-but-no-position conditions (detector_missing, low_confidence, jump_rejected).
Unit tests cover unknown emission and validate with validate_track_record_v1.

deliverables.title: Ball tracker supports unknown emission
acceptance: Unknown emission has stable reason vocabulary and does not conflict with missing semantics.
Contract validation passes and documentation is updated as needed.
evidence: Deterministic tests validate unknown emission behavior.

subtasks.title: Define unknown reason vocabulary for ball tracker.
done_when: Unknown reasons are explicit, stable, and referenced from centralized constants if applicable.

subtasks.title: Implement unknown emission and add tests.
done_when: Tracker emits unknown for the defined unevaluable condition and tests cover it deterministically.
